p: Glibenclamide (Sanofi-aventis, France), glucose solution (Reyoung pharmaceuticals, China), 2, 2-Diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl, 3.5 (Sigma Aldrich, Germany), Streptozotocin (Fisco Research laboratories, India), deep freezer (Labfreez instrument group, Germany), Hot air oven (Medit-Medizin Technik, Germany), automated chemistry analyzer (Shenzhen Mindray Bio-medical Electronics Co., Ltd, China), pH meter (Bante Instruments, UK), desiccators, and digital electronic balance (EPH-400 Abron Exports) were used in the study.
